```python
N, A = map(int, input().split())

if N == 1:
    print(1)
else:
    low = 0
    high = 2 * N
    ans = high
    while low <= high:
        mid = (low + high) // 2
        cookies = 0
        time = 0
        x = 1
        while True:
            elapsed_time = min(mid - time, (N - cookies) // x)
            cookies += elapsed_time * x
            time += elapsed_time
            if cookies >= N:
                ans = min(ans, mid)
                high = mid -1
                break
            time += A
            x = cookies
            if time > mid:
                low = mid + 1
                break

    print(ans)
```
